message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. This is a high-quality item worth more than $100 to you, and we believe this price reflects its value while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. We're confident you'll find it worth every penny.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider $85 for the product?

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, we've decided to adjust our offer to $90 for the product. We hope this price better aligns with your budget while still allowing us to fairly compensate for the value we provide.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose $87 for the product. I hope this price works for both of us.
